name: Bond of Life
description:
When the character to which this is attached is healed: This effect will be consumed once for every Usage(s) it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revives or healing caused by redistribution of HP)
Usage(s): 1 (Can stack, no stack limit).
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached is healed:</color> This effect will be consumed once for every $[K3] it has to negate 1 HP of healing received. (Cannot negate revives or healing caused by redistribution of HP)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack, no stack limit).
